import React from'react';import'./style.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import defualtProfileImage from'assets/image/default-profile-image.png';import{BOARD_DETAIL_PATH,BOARD_PATH}from'constant';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";//          component: Board List Item 컴포넌트          //
export default function BoardItem(_ref){let{boardListItem}=_ref;//          state: properties          //
const{boardNumber,title,content,boardTitleImage}=boardListItem;const{favoriteCount,commentCount,viewCount}=boardListItem;const{writeDatetime,writerNickname,writerProfileImage}=boardListItem;//          function: 네비게이트 함수          //
const navigte=useNavigate();//          event handler: 게시물 아이템 클릭 이벤트 처리 함수          //
const onClickHander=()=>{navigte(BOARD_PATH()+'/'+BOARD_DETAIL_PATH(boardNumber));};//          render: Board List Item 컴포넌트 렌더링          //
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board-list-item",onClick:onClickHander,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board-list-item-main-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board-list-item-top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-profile-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-profile-image",style:{backgroundImage:`url(${writerProfileImage?writerProfileImage:defualtProfileImage})`}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board-list-item-write-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-nickname",children:writerNickname}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-write-date",children:writeDatetime})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board-list-item-middle",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-content",children:content})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-bottom",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-counts",children:`댓글 ${commentCount} · 좋아요 ${favoriteCount} · 조회수 ${viewCount}`})})]}),boardTitleImage!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-image-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"board-list-item-image",style:{backgroundImage:`url(${boardTitleImage})`}})})]});}
